snippet: The Red Cross gave people it had helped video cameras to record their stories and is using the results in its year-end fund-raising campaign.
abstract: Advertising column notes American Red Cross has commissioned new public service campaign to raise money in the holiday season by showing how organization helps people facing problems other than major disasters like Hurricane Sandy.
